job.title: Senior Software Engineer and Team Leader (1308)
job.description: stronguAbout The PositionbrbrustrongWe are looking for an experienced fullstack software engineer to join our software development team with experience designing building and scaling microservices in a cloud environment Youll be working with a team of software engineers to create microservices in AWS making thousands of Single Digits networks more userfriendly reliable and scalable You will follow Agile DevOps processes build exciting new features and deliver those features using our automated CICD process Engineers in this position must either have experience with the networking industry or be quick to learn new skillsbrbrstronguRoles And Responsibilitiesbrustrongul liDesign and develop reliable and scalable microservices in AWS using Java Reactjs Docker and AWS platform technologiesli liDesign and implement REST APIs using OpenAPIli liLead a team of software engineers using Agile DevOps processes and proceduresli liCollaborate with customers and functional experts to understand technical requirements and provide innovative solutionsli liOther duties as assignedli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li57 years of experience with building scalable eventbased microservices with Java and AWS platform services such as EventBridgeli liExperience with DevOps processes in AWS including EKS and Terraformli liExperience with SQL using AWS RDS as well as NoSQL using DynamoDBli li13 years of team leadershipli liWorking knowledge of the networking industry is preferred including familiarity with networking protocols such as TCPIP and SNMP as well as experience with access points switches and firewallsli liScrum master certification preferredliul
